content: CP 644 Firestop collars US Retrofit firestop collar with a galvanized steel housing for 8 and 10 pipes ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop collars, wraps and bandages- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy firestopping of combustible pipes through fire-rated walls and floors Latch mechanism for quick and easy closure Flexible hook positioning for convenient fastening Can be uninstalled Easy to inspect Applications Sealing flammable pipes from 32 mm to 250 mm diameter in penetrations through fire compartment walls and floors PVC, HDPE, PP and ABS pipes Pipes with acoustic insulation Walls from 100 mm thick and floors from 150 mm thick Conduit bundles For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete, Drywall, Masonry LEED VOC: 7.6 g/l Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to): 1:17 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Masonry | LEED VOC | 7.6 g/l | Expansion ratio (unrestricted, up to) | 1:17 | Expansion temperature (Approx.) | 410 째F | Can be painted | No | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 째F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 째F | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 212 째F ### ITEMS- 304341 - FS collar CP 644 8 - Package Size 1 pc - 304344 - FS collar CP 644 10 - Package Size 1 pc
